title: Converse Cons presents Berlin Spring
description:
Converse Cons in association with Grey Skateboard Magazine presents Berlin Spring featuring European Ambassadors Jerome Campbell, Harry Lintell, David Stenstrom, Danny Sommerfeld and Rory Milanes.
Berlin is the host of our second city feature after Lisbon Story where the spring weather certainly played it’s part, although it rained everyday we still managed to carve out a great time and captured some rad skateboarding.
